channel.title: [pi] buy 20 get 1
channel.description: when you enter a shop and say buy 20 runes it only gives me 1 how do i fix on project insanity base

item.title: [pi] buy 20 get 1
item.dc:creator: @stickywicky stickywicky
item.description:
@stickywicky wrote:

nicks:

go find the code that declares this and change it to 20…

see no code does :s

heres a quote from one java file

[code]
switch(interfaceId){
case 3900:
c.getShops().buyItem(removeId, removeSlot, 10);
break;

		case 3823:
		c.getShops().sellItem(removeId, removeSlot, 10);
		break;
		
		case 5064:
		if (Item.itemStackable[removeId]) {
			c.getItems().bankItem(c.playerItems[removeSlot] , removeSlot, c.playerItemsN[removeSlot]);
		} else {
			c.getItems().bankItem(c.playerItems[removeSlot] , removeSlot, c.getItems().itemAmount(c.playerItems[removeSlot]));
		}
		break;[/code]
